text:
(ENCHANTER) You easily weave the necessary enchantment. Images pour in, showing you parts of several possible futures.

[You start back as you see yourself in this very chamber, locked in mortal combat with a ravening vampire-lord! The image disintegrates to show another possibility -- this time you are entering the room at the top of the tower. An oppressive feeling of danger weighs upon you.]

The spell fades, returning your spirit to the present. What do you want to do now?

choices.text: Leave to go on up the stairs
